fb.rt
Class FBInstance

java.lang.Object
  fb.datatype.ANY
      fb.rt.AbstractAdapter
          fb.rt.FBInstance
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventServer
Direct Known Subclasses:
DM_KRNL, FBClient, FBFunction, Resource, SimpleFB
public abstract class FBInstance
extends AbstractAdapter

This class is the abstract superclass of all function block instances.

          The ECC state index

initIDs

public void initIDs(java.lang.String fbname)
If the block has a WSTRING ID input, initializes it to the FB name if not already initialized. Subclasses may initialize other inputs by supplementing this method.

Parameters:
fbname - The name to use in initialization.

public void restart()
Performs a warm restart on this element.
